actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."products" SET
		"sku" = '{{update_form.fieldState.sku.isVisible ? update_form.formData.sku : update_form.sourceData.sku}}',
		"product_name" = '{{update_form.fieldState.product_name.isVisible ? update_form.formData.product_name : update_form.sourceData.product_name}}',
    "price_per_unit" = '{{update_form.fieldState.price_per_unit.isVisible ? update_form.formData.price_per_unit : update_form.sourceData.price_per_unit}}',
		"amount" = '{{update_form.fieldState.amount.isVisible ? update_form.formData.amount : update_form.sourceData.amount}}',
		"category" = '{{update_form.fieldState.category.isVisible ? update_form.formData.category : update_form.sourceData.category}}',
		"product_image" = '{{update_form.fieldState.product_image.isVisible ? update_form.formData.product_image : update_form.sourceData.product_image}}'
WHERE "product_id" = {{data_table.selectedRow.product_id}};
